values.description:
This is a retargeted version of pull request #249. This PR is aimed at the default branch instead of a prototyping branch. It also contains some changes based on reviewer feedback.

Two things still on the todo list:

1. Write more tests for the raw publications and subscriptions. It would be especially good to have tests that use multiple processes. Two sub-tests were added in 1cc9ddf but more are needed.

2. Determine whether we would rather have the `Publish(~)` implementation proposed [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/249/wip-subscribe-and-publish-raw-serialized/activity#comment-51885932) which is cleaner and easier to follow, or the current implementation which is more aggressive about avoiding unnecessary deserialization.

Note that some of the reviewer feedback is being addressed separately in pull request #250, and I expect that branch to get merged first.
values.title: Subscribe and publish raw (serialized) data

summary.raw:
This is a retargeted version of pull request #249. This PR is aimed at the default branch instead of a prototyping branch. It also contains some changes based on reviewer feedback.

Two things still on the todo list:

1. Write more tests for the raw publications and subscriptions. It would be especially good to have tests that use multiple processes. Two sub-tests were added in 1cc9ddf but more are needed.

2. Determine whether we would rather have the `Publish(~)` implementation proposed [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/249/wip-subscribe-and-publish-raw-serialized/activity#comment-51885932) which is cleaner and easier to follow, or the current implementation which is more aggressive about avoiding unnecessary deserialization.

Note that some of the reviewer feedback is being addressed separately in pull request #250, and I expect that branch to get merged first.
summary.html:
This is a retargeted version of pull request #249. This PR is aimed at the default branch instead of a prototyping branch. It also contains some changes based on reviewer feedback.

Two things still on the todo list:

  1. Write more tests for the raw publications and subscriptions. It would be especially good to have tests that use multiple processes. Two sub-tests were added in 1cc9ddf but more are needed.

  2. Determine whether we would rather have the Publish(~) implementation proposed here which is cleaner and easier to follow, or the current implementation which is more aggressive about avoiding unnecessary deserialization.

Note that some of the reviewer feedback is being addressed separately in pull request #250, and I expect that branch to get merged first.

values.description: Add the local directory where the library has been built to `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` instead of fully overwrite its entire content. This was generating some issues documented [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/239/use-ign-cmake/activity#comment-52478932).
values.title: Do not overwrite LD_LIBRARY_PATH

summary.raw: Add the local directory where the library has been built to `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` instead of fully overwrite its entire content. This was generating some issues documented [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/239/use-ign-cmake/activity#comment-52478932).
summary.html: Add the local directory where the library has been built to LD_LIBRARY_PATH instead of fully overwrite its entire content. This was generating some issues documented here.

values.description:
This resolves conflicts with pull request #251.

* Modified the example to use ignition:msgs::StringMsg instead of explicitly coding a raw byte array.
* Modified the `Publish` commands to put the verb (action) first and the descriptor for the action second.
* Reworked Node::Publish to serialize in only one place, and fail out early.
* Added notes that `RawPublish` performs a copy.
* Backported pull request #254
values.title: Resolve conflicts

summary.raw:
This resolves conflicts with pull request #251.

* Modified the example to use ignition:msgs::StringMsg instead of explicitly coding a raw byte array.
* Modified the `Publish` commands to put the verb (action) first and the descriptor for the action second.
* Reworked Node::Publish to serialize in only one place, and fail out early.
* Added notes that `RawPublish` performs a copy.
* Backported pull request #254
summary.html:
This resolves conflicts with pull request #251.

  • Modified the example to use ignition:msgs::StringMsg instead of explicitly coding a raw byte array.
  • Modified the Publish commands to put the verb (action) first and the descriptor for the action second.
  • Reworked Node::Publish to serialize in only one place, and fail out early.
  • Added notes that RawPublish performs a copy.
  • Backported pull request #254

values.description:
Fixes this build warning:

```
In file included from /home/nkoenig/work/ignition/ign-transport/src/ign.cc:32:0:
/home/nkoenig/work/ignition/ign-transport/src/ign.cc: In function ‘char* ignitionVersion()’:
/home/nkoenig/work/ignition/ign-transport/build/include/ignition/transport/config.hh:9:41: warning: ISO C++ forbids converting a string constant to ‘char*’ [-Wpedantic]
 #define IGNITION_TRANSPORT_VERSION_FULL "4.0.0~pre1"
                                         ^
/home/nkoenig/work/ignition/ign-transport/src/ign.cc:285:10: note: in expansion of macro ‘IGNITION_TRANSPORT_VERSION_FULL’
   return IGNITION_TRANSPORT_VERSION_FULL;
```

values.description:
This adds a command to record and playback ignition transport topics using ignition tools.

```
$ ign log record -v 4 --file test.tlog
$ ign log playback -v 4 --file test.tlog
```

This is the final PR split off pull request #252
values.title: Logging Part 8: Ignition tools `ign log` command

summary.raw:
This adds a command to record and playback ignition transport topics using ignition tools.

```
$ ign log record -v 4 --file test.tlog
$ ign log playback -v 4 --file test.tlog
```

This is the final PR split off pull request #252
summary.html:
This adds a command to record and playback ignition transport topics using ignition tools.

$ ign log record -v 4 --file test.tlog
$ ign log playback -v 4 --file test.tlog

This is the final PR split off pull request #252

values.description:
There were some flaky tests related with timing. We should also use `steady_clock` instead of `system_clock` in our use case because we essentially need a stopwatch that is not adjusted from time to time.

[Homebrew](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/340/) is happy now. :blue_circle:
values.title: Fix Homebrew fix tests

summary.raw:
There were some flaky tests related with timing. We should also use `steady_clock` instead of `system_clock` in our use case because we essentially need a stopwatch that is not adjusted from time to time.

[Homebrew](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/340/) is happy now. :blue_circle:
summary.html:
There were some flaky tests related with timing. We should also use steady_clock instead of system_clock in our use case because we essentially need a stopwatch that is not adjusted from time to time.

Homebrew is happy now.

values.description:
Before: defining a variable with the major version and then calling `find_package` with a package name containing the variable.

After: calling `find_package` with a literal string as the package name (containing the major version) and then defining the variable containing the major version based on the CMake variable provided by the CMake config file.

Advantage: the dependency on `ignition-msgs1` can be automatically introspected (without the need to evaluate CMake code).
values.title: invert the ignition-msgs version logic

summary.raw:
Before: defining a variable with the major version and then calling `find_package` with a package name containing the variable.

After: calling `find_package` with a literal string as the package name (containing the major version) and then defining the variable containing the major version based on the CMake variable provided by the CMake config file.

Advantage: the dependency on `ignition-msgs1` can be automatically introspected (without the need to evaluate CMake code).
summary.html:
Before: defining a variable with the major version and then calling find_package with a package name containing the variable.

After: calling find_package with a literal string as the package name (containing the major version) and then defining the variable containing the major version based on the CMake variable provided by the CMake config file.

Advantage: the dependency on ignition-msgs1 can be automatically introspected (without the need to evaluate CMake code).

values.description:
This PR is mostly an exercise to illustrate a fully componentized version of [Logging Part 8](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/276).

I'll port these changes over to a different PR that will branch off of the current `default`. That will be much easier to review. In the meantime, we can rest assured that we have a working solution for migrating `ign-transport` over to `ign-cmake1`.
values.title: Logging Part 9: Componentization [Do Not Review]

summary.raw:
This PR is mostly an exercise to illustrate a fully componentized version of [Logging Part 8](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/pull-requests/276).

I'll port these changes over to a different PR that will branch off of the current `default`. That will be much easier to review. In the meantime, we can rest assured that we have a working solution for migrating `ign-transport` over to `ign-cmake1`.
summary.html:
This PR is mostly an exercise to illustrate a fully componentized version of Logging Part 8.

I'll port these changes over to a different PR that will branch off of the current default. That will be much easier to review. In the meantime, we can rest assured that we have a working solution for migrating ign-transport over to ign-cmake1.

values.reason: This will be replaced by a different PR

values.description:
This takes care of migrating the current default branch of `ign-transport` into `ign-cmake1`, and turns `ignition-transport-log` into a proper component.

Most of the "big" changes are actually just private headers being moved from `include/ignition/transport` into `src/`, which isn't directly related to componentization or `ign-cmake1`, but it does make our file structure somewhat cleaner.
values.title: Make ign-transport compatible with ign-cmake1

summary.raw:
This takes care of migrating the current default branch of `ign-transport` into `ign-cmake1`, and turns `ignition-transport-log` into a proper component.

Most of the "big" changes are actually just private headers being moved from `include/ignition/transport` into `src/`, which isn't directly related to componentization or `ign-cmake1`, but it does make our file structure somewhat cleaner.
summary.html:
This takes care of migrating the current default branch of ign-transport into ign-cmake1, and turns ignition-transport-log into a proper component.

Most of the "big" changes are actually just private headers being moved from include/ignition/transport into src/, which isn't directly related to componentization or ign-cmake1, but it does make our file structure somewhat cleaner.

values.description: This is a part of pull request #298 that was easy to split out.
values.title: Move private headers to src folder

summary.raw: This is a part of pull request #298 that was easy to split out.
summary.html: This is a part of pull request #298 that was easy to split out.

values.description:
This is split out from the Components / ign-cmake1 pull request #298.

* ~~f3d2c11: adjusts timing on some tests~~ this has been reverted

* 53190b4: uses `IGN_TRANSPORT_TEST_DIR` define to locate executables needed by tests. This is helpful because pull request #298 will change where these executables are located in the build folder. There were some similar changes to the `tools` test folder, but that wasn't working without the other changes in pull request #298, so I left them isolated.
values.title: Integration tests: clean up paths and some timing

summary.raw:
This is split out from the Components / ign-cmake1 pull request #298.

* ~~f3d2c11: adjusts timing on some tests~~ this has been reverted

* 53190b4: uses `IGN_TRANSPORT_TEST_DIR` define to locate executables needed by tests. This is helpful because pull request #298 will change where these executables are located in the build folder. There were some similar changes to the `tools` test folder, but that wasn't working without the other changes in pull request #298, so I left them isolated.
summary.html:
This is split out from the Components / ign-cmake1 pull request #298.

  • f3d2c11: adjusts timing on some tests this has been reverted

  • 53190b4: uses IGN_TRANSPORT_TEST_DIR define to locate executables needed by tests. This is helpful because pull request #298 will change where these executables are located in the build folder. There were some similar changes to the tools test folder, but that wasn't working without the other changes in pull request #298, so I left them isolated.
